data.name: Sample - IBM IAM - 1.0.0
data.description: The IBM IAM Identity Service API is used to manage service IDs, API key identities, trusted profiles, account security settings and to create IAM access tokens for a user or service ID.

workflows.description: Retrieves the list of API key details for a given service or user IAM ID and account ID.
workflows.name: Get API Keys

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Get API Keys

workflows.description: Creates an API key for a UserID or service ID. Users can manage user API keys for themself, or service ID API keys for service IDs they have access to
workflows.name: Create An API Key

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Create An API Key

workflows.description: Retrieves the details of an API key by its value.
workflows.name: Get API Key Details By Value

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Get API Key Details By Value

steps.name: Get API Key Details By Value

arguments.name: IBM IAM
arguments.operationTitle: Get API Key Details By Value

routes.name: Start-> Get API Key Details By Value

workflows.description: Returns the details of an API key
workflows.name: Get API Key Details

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Get API Key Details

workflows.description: Updates an API key using a UserID or service ID.
workflows.name: Update API Key

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Update API Key

workflows.description: Deletes an API key.
workflows.name: Delete API Key

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Delete API Key

workflows.description: Lock an API key by ID.
workflows.name: Lock API Key

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Lock API Key

workflows.description: Un-Lock an API key by ID.
workflows.name: UnLock API Key

arguments.title: IBM IAM: UnLock API Key

workflows.description: Disable an API key.
workflows.name: Disable the API key

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Disable the API key

workflows.description: Enable an API key.
workflows.name: Enable the API key

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Enable the API key

workflows.description: Returns a list of service IDs. Users can manage user API keys for themself, or service ID API keys for service IDs they have access.
workflows.name: List Service IDs By Name

arguments.title: IBM IAM: List Service IDs By Name

routes.name: Start-> List Service IDs By Name

workflows.description: Returns a list of service IDs. Users can manage user API keys for themself, or service ID API keys for service IDs they have access.
workflows.name: List Service IDs By Account ID

arguments.title: IBM IAM: List Service IDs By Account ID

workflows.description: Creates a service ID for an IBM Cloud account. Users can manage user API keys for themself, or service ID API keys for service IDs.
workflows.name: Create A Service ID

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Create A Service ID

workflows.description: Updates properties of a service ID.
workflows.name: Update Service ID

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Update Service ID

workflows.description: Deletes a service ID and all API keys associated to it. Before deleting the service ID, all associated API keys are deleted.
workflows.name: Delete Service ID and Associated API keys

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Delete Service ID and Associated API keys

steps.name: Delete Service ID and Associated API keys

arguments.name: IBM IAM
arguments.operationTitle: Delete Service ID and Associated API keys

routes.name: Start-> Delete Service ID and Associated API keys

workflows.description: Locks a service ID by ID. Users can manage user API keys for themself, or service ID API keys for service IDs
workflows.name: Lock The Service ID

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Lock The Service ID

workflows.description: Unlocks a service ID by ID. Users can manage user API keys for themself, or service ID API keys for service IDs
workflows.name: Unlock The Service ID

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Unlock The Service ID

workflows.description: Returns the details of an account's configuration.
workflows.name: Get Account Configurations

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Get Account Configurations

workflows.description: Allows a user to configure settings on their account with regards to MFA, MFA excemption list, session lifetimes, access control for creating new identities, and enforcing IP restrictions on token creation.
workflows.name: Update Account Configurations

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Update Account Configurations

workflows.description: Trigger activity report for the account by specifying the account ID. It can take a few minutes to generate the report for retrieval.
workflows.name: Trigger Activity Repor

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Trigger Activity Report

workflows.description: Get activity report for the account by specifying the account ID and the reference that is generated by triggering the report. Reports older than a day are deleted when generating a new report.
workflows.name: Get Activity Report

arguments.title: IBM IAM: Get Activity Report
